Need 4 Speed (Comparisons)

I enjoy watching Formula One, and find streaming the races really fun, but I always wonder how the speed of a Formula One car compares to other things.

This is a visualization of the different speeds for different animals and vehicles, compared to one another. Hope you like playing with it as much as I do!! Thereâ€™s also a form for you to perform head to head comparisons, and guess which one is faster.
